ADD_EXECUTABLE(Demo01_TheBasics demo01.cpp OgreNewtonApplication.cpp OgreNewtonFrameListener.cpp)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Demo01_TheBasics ${OGRE_LIBRARIES} ${CEGUI_LIBRARIES} ${OGRENEWT_LIBRARIES} ${OIS_LIBRARIES} ${CEGUIOGRE_LIBRARIES})

#INSTALL(TARGETS Demo01_TheBasics RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/bin)
